title: User Registration with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid username, email, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the user registration page.
Input a valid username.
Input a valid email address.
Input a secure password that meets the password policy.
Submit the registration form.
Check that registration is successful and user is redirected to the login page or dashboard.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify that registration fails when an invalid email format is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the user registration page.
Input a valid username.
Input an invalid email address (e.g., 'useratexample.com').
Input a valid password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that an error message indicating invalid email format is displayed and registration is prevented.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can log in successfully using valid username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered username or email.
Input the correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard with personalized content.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login fails when entering incorrect password for a registered user.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered username or email.
Input an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and an appropriate error message is shown to the user.

title: Dashboard Loads User-Specific Content
description: Verify the dashboard loads accurate and personalized content for the logged-in user.

steps.description: Log in successfully to the application.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Check the dashboard displays content that is specific and relevant to the logged-in user.

title: Dashboard User Actions Execution
description: Verify user can perform expected actions on dashboard content such as adding, editing, and deleting items.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard.
Add a new content item.
Confirm the new item appears on the dashboard list.
Edit an existing item.
Confirm changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Delete an existing item.
Confirm the item is removed from the dashboard.

title: OCR Text Extraction from Clear Image
description: Verify that the OCR Scanner extracts text accurately from a clear, high-quality image.

steps.description: Navigate to the OCR Scanner feature.
Upload or select a clear, high-resolution image containing printed text.
Start the OCR scan.
Verify that the extracted text matches the text present in the image accurately.

title: OCR Text Extraction from Low-Quality Image
description: Verify OCR Scanner can handle low-quality or blurred images and still extract readable text with tolerable accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to the OCR Scanner feature.
Upload a low-quality or slightly blurred image containing text.
Start the OCR scan.
Verify that the OCR result extracts the majority of text correctly, allowing for minor errors.

title: OCR Scanner with Image Having No Text
description: Verify that the OCR Scanner correctly handles images with no text and returns an empty or appropriate result.

steps.description: Navigate to the OCR Scanner feature.
Upload an image that contains no text or is purely graphical.
Start the OCR scan.
Verify that the output indicates no text was found or returns an empty string, and displays a helpful message.

title: API Endpoint Response for AI Services Success
description: Verify that backend API endpoints respond correctly and deliver expected AI service functionalities with valid requests.

steps.description: Send valid API requests to AI service endpoints with proper parameters and authentication.
Verify the response status is success (e.g., HTTP 200) and the returned data matches the expected AI service output.

title: API Endpoint Handling of Invalid Requests
description: Verify API endpoints handle invalid or malformed requests gracefully and provide appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Send API requests with invalid parameters, missing required fields, or wrong data types to AI service endpoints.
Check that the API responds with proper error codes (e.g., HTTP 400) and meaningful error messages describing the issue.

title: API Endpoint Unauthorized Access Prevention
description: Verify that backend API endpoints reject unauthorized access attempts and protect secured AI services.

steps.description: Attempt to access AI backend API endpoints without authentication or with invalid credentials.
Confirm the API responds with unauthorized status (e.g., HTTP 401) and denies access to the service.

title: Documentation Accessibility Check
description: Verify that developer documentation is accessible from the application and loads without error.

steps.description: Navigate to the developer documentation section or URL.
Confirm documentation pages load successfully and display content properly.

title: Developer Documentation Content Verification
description: Verify that developer documentation is clear, comprehensive, and includes guides to support API integration and platform usage.

steps.description: Open key sections of the developer documentation including API guides, authentication instructions, and feature descriptions.
Check the documentation contains clear examples, detailed explanations, and is easy to understand for developers.

title: Session Management Post Login
description: Verify that after login, user session is maintained correctly across dashboard and API calls until logout.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Navigate across dashboard pages and perform API requests requiring authentication.
Verify user remains authenticated and session is active; no need to re-login.
Logout from the application.
Verify session is cleared and user is unable to access protected dashboard or API endpoints.

title: Password Security Policy Enforcement
description: Verify the registration and password change enforce required password complexity policies (e.g., length, characters).

steps.description: Navigate to registration or password change form.
Enter passwords that do not meet policy requirements (e.g., too short, missing character types).
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify that submission is blocked and a descriptive error message is presented specifying password requirements.
